notes: Most accommodations confirmed. Beijing rental apartment (Days 9-21) requires booking - recommended areas are Wudaokou (student hub, 3500-5000 RMB/month shared, up to 6000 RMB/month single), Zhongguancun (tech district, pricier but convenient), or Suzhoujie/Weigongcun (cheaper, local). Estimated total rental cost for 13 nights: ~$585 USD based on ¥4,500-5,500/month average for 1-bedroom apartments in university area. Use Ziroom app (English interface, foreigner-friendly) or check specialized sites like uhomes.com and wudaokouapartment.com. Priority criteria: walkable to Tsinghua/Peking University, student-friendly neighborhood with cafes and shops, full kitchen for extended stay comfort. Hotel costs are estimates - actual prices may vary by season and availability. Book hotels directly for best rates and flexibility.
